title: How Do I Tell My Husband I'm Burned Out?
description:
Robin has an 8-year-old, a job, plus takes care of the family farm and doesn't know how to talk to her husband about how drained and unhappy she is. - Dr. Laura: "Husbands want their wives to have the time and energy to feel sexual."

What's one thing could you delete from your to-do list that would give you more time with your spouse? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:
